title: Romanian central bank's governor sees 1% or higher economic growth this year
description: National Bank of Romania (BNR) governor Mugur Isărescu, on November 14, while unveiling the Inflation Report, argued that the Romanian economy will most likely not record two consecutive quarters of negative growth, which would mean entering a recession, but even in such a scenario, the evolution fo...

title: Romania’s Banca Transilvania completes largest AT1 bond issuance in Central and Eastern Europe
description: Romania’s leading bank, Banca Transilvania, announced the successful completion of its first AT1 (Additional Tier 1) bond issuance on the Dublin Stock Exchange. The final volume of subscribed orders reached over EUR 2.65 billion, representing an oversubscription 5.3 times higher than the amount BT i...

title: Romania's Jan-Oct budget gap contracts to 20.4 bln euro
Romania's CFA macroeconomic confidence index plunges to historic low in October
description:
The macroeconomic confidence index compiled by Romania's CFA Society association of analysts, based on a survey among its members, plunged sharply by 7.3 points to 30.2 points, with the current conditions (32.3 points) only marginally superior to the expectations (29.2 points).
